column4: most of the functionality was removed in the latest gdm, so you're pretty much out of luck until they decide to add that back in
you can change the wallpaper if you want though, gksudo -u gdm dbus-launch gnome-appearance-properties;
wat can i do now switch to 9.04 again? i just wanted to learn ubuntu no matter what it takes
I wouldn't switch back to 9.04 just because you can't do much to theme gdm, you hardly spend any time on that screen
